div.p:
TheThe whole entry has been deleted. xxviij dai of Julij the yher' et cetera and fiftee / Dauid Dun and Dauid
hervy / fand Androw of buchane and gilbert meignes borowes to the
Aldirman and balyheis of this burgh' / that thai sall keip this
burgh' hamrlace harmlace and scathlass' of al

Vicesimo die mensis Septembris Anno Domini et cetera quinquagesimo / thomas blyndseil
burgensis huius burgj'j' overwrites 'e'. ob honorem dei omnipotentis eiusque matris virginis gloriose
et omnium sanctorum ac beati petri apostoli pro salute anime sue parentum et prolium so suorum
et omnium fidelium defunctorum dedit concessit assignauit et deliberauit ac per manus
Ricardi Kintor vnius balliuorum huius burgi deliberari fecit saisinam et possessionem
perpetuam in puram elimosinam altari beati petri apostoli cituato in ecclesiam parrochiali
beati nicholai huius burgi annuos Redditus infrascriptos / videlicet de vno
crofto Jacente prope the fisbrig vocato ly halilandis xij s' / de ly clayhill'
xiij s' iiij d' / de ly schort croft / et ly twa lang Riggis Jacentibus in territorio
croftorum de futy xiij s' iiij d' / de terra quam idem thomas inhabitauit
xiij s' iiij d' // de tenemento ipsius thome Jacente in ly buthraw xiij s' iiij d'
de terra Willelmj Cowtis Jacente in ly grene x s' // de terra eiusdem thome
Jacente in ly nethirkirkgate x s' / de terra sua quam mergareta de marr'
inhabitat vj s' viij d' // de terra Jacenti Johannis Wood Jacente ex parte orientali
vici furcarum xiiij s' / de terra que fuit Johannis mersar' xiij s' iiij d' /
de terra que fuit Johannis scherar' apud finem orientalem vici castri v s'
Et de terra quam Willelmus lammynton' tenet ad feodofirmam de eodem
thoma in vico de futy . viij s' // testibus Johanne de scrogs filio tunc
preposito Willelmo blyndseil filio eiusdem thome / Alexandro crine Willelmo voket
magistro Johanne cadiou notario publico / thoma andirson' de Inuerowry

Curia gilde tenta per Johannem de Scrogs prepositum et Duncanum de clat decanum gilde
in pretorio ixno die mensis octobris Anno Domini et cetera millesimo quadringentesimo quinquagesimo

Quo die gilbertus meignes Johannes de Scrogs pater Johannes de marr' Johannes
de fife Johannes gray et patricius badenach' / electi fuerunt auditores computorum
decani gilde et magistrorum fabrice ecclesie de duobus annis vltimo preteritis .

Thomas Coky posuit se in voluntate de forisstallacione animalium et finiuit pro xx s' soluendis
citra festum Natiuitatis Domini proximo futuro plegio Andrea thomson' de ponte .

Johannes chapman et Willelmus cury commorantes in brechyne dederunt Johannem Kymedy plegium quod
amodo non forisstallabunt infra libertatem huius burgi sub pena Juris .

It is consentit statute and ordanit be the maste parte of brethir' of the gild
of this burgh' / for commoune profite and vphald of merchandis' that na
nyghbor' of this burgh' sell salt grete salt derrar' than bettir chape
than viij s' the boll / the pynt of terr' vj d' / the stane of Irn
iij s' // vndir the payne of viij s' to be Raisit of the fawtouris for
ilke faute vnforgiffin to the commoune profite of this burgh'

Item that naman by hidis derrar' than iij s' the ox hide / and the
kow hidis for ij s' or within / vndir the said payne vnforgiffin
and withoute favour' //

Item that naman by hidis quhill thai be present to the cors' vndir the said
payne to be Raisit als oft as it beis taynt

Item that naman by vitaile to sell derrar' agayne and make merchandis'
of it / vndir payne of eschete of the thing and viij s' vnforgiffin

Donaldus donaldson' conuictus fuit de forisstallacione lane et pellium ac communi exsportacione
vltra montes et finiuit pro xiij s' iiij d' soluendis in festo pasche plegio Roberto
baroune et quod amodo non exsportabit sub pena omnium bonorum suorum

Normannus de Edyndeach' conuictus fuit de forisstallacione trium petrarum lane et finiuit pro
v s' soluendis ad festam purificacionis beate marie et amplius non forisstallab forisstallabit sub pena
iuris plegio Willelmo edyndeach'.
Willelmus Alaneson' confessus fuit forisstallacionem pellium et regratacionem et finiuit pro
Johannes greison' conuictus fuit pro Regratacione Denariatorum

Johannes stewart posuit se in voluntate pro forisstallacione pellium et regratacione et finiuit pro
xiij s' iiij d'

The secunde dai of Nouembre the yher' forsaid Duncane of Clat dene of gilde presente in the
Courte the Eucariste of siluer quhilk theman goldsmyth' had in making To the
making of the quhilk Eucariste the forsaid Duncane deliuerit iiijxx iij vnce of siluer
and he paijt in parte of the makyng iiij lib' / And he has ressauit agayne
in werk liiij vnce the quhilk he present in the courte / And swa remanys
in themannis handis xxix vnce for the quhilk maistir John' of Cadiou is
becummyn and becummys dettour' be this writ writtin with' his propre hand

Johannes harpar' finiuit pro forisstallacione sua pro xiij s' iiij d' soluendis in festo penthecostes
plegio seipso

Huchoune Adameson' posuit se in voluntate de forisstallacione pro et finiuit pro xx s'
soluendis ad festa carnispreuij et pasche / plegio quod reintrabit bona sua et pro
summa georgio Adameson' fratre suo .

Ricardus hill posuit in voluntate de forisstallacione et finiuit pro xiij s' iiij d' soluendis ad festum pentecostes
proximo / plegio Willelmo de Rettre / et quod non remanebit vlt amodo extra burgum forisstallando
sub pena amissionis libertatis sue

div.head: Artifices non liberi finentes cum preposito pro arte
div.p:
Textores
Anabella dicta Wodcok
John' Swan
John' Williamson'
John' thomson'

Andreas murreve conuictus fuit per assisam de forisstallacione lane pellium et correorum ac regratacione
denariatorum

Will Thomas quhite conuictus fuit de foristallacione lane pellium ac regratacione
denariatorum

Sexto die mensis Maij . Anno Domini et cetera quinquagesimo primo / The counsaile and the
maste parte of the gilde / avisitli consentit to mak in hand a finance of iiijxx lib' to the
Erle of huntlee in full payment of the jC lib' acht' til him to be paijt to him
as apperis be the lettres endentit betuix him and the Communitee of this ton'
for the quhilk finance to be made now hastili thai consent and will that
the termes of the wattirez be lynthit' / and the soume Raisit thar'of be the
sight' of certane persounes chosin thar'too to the nowmer of vj or vij persounes
The quhilkis soumes salbe allowit to the fermouris of the wattirez yher'ly
and termely be the avis' of the sammyn persounes . And the hale gilde has
chosin thir persounes / John' of Scrogs Aldirman John' of fife Gilbert meignes John' of
Scrogs the fadre John' of Marr' Duncane of Clat and John' gray . The quhilke
persounes sall haue poware to set and dispone apon all Wattirez vakand be statute
or othir' waijs / and to menys' and less' the maalez of ony wattirez send sene
speidfull to thaim And Right' swa of al othiris takis of the toune .

Curia gilde burgi de Abirdene tenta per Johannem scrogis prepositum et Duncanum clat
decanum in pretorio eiusdem burgi Anno Domini millesimo quadringentesimo quinquagesimo primo

Quo die thomas litstar' posuit se in voluntate pro iniusta ocupacione artis sui
in preiudicio confratrum gilde

Eodem die intrauit vxor Willelmi fichet et filia cum Gilberto salchorr' cum et malcomo forbas
prelocutoribus earundem qui alligauerunt ipsam habere proprietatem et possessionem vnius crofti vocati
halylandis et omnium aliarum terrarum et annui reddituum preter crofttum de hedonnis hill
qui protestauerunt quod Willelmus fichet aliquod iniuste operando de dictis terris non faciet id quod
accedat sibi in preiudicio sue possessionis dictarum terrarum

p.hi: Burgenses et confratres gilde facti secundo anno prepositure Johannis

div.p:
Alexander Stell filius quondam Simonis still receptus fuit racione paterne libertatis pro
v s' in alba bursa prestito solito Juramento plegio

forsith' sutor receptus fuit ad ex gracia consilij ad personalem instanciam et requestum
Magister Ricardi forbes camerarij Regis pro v s' prestito solito Juramento plegio

p.hi: Burgenses tantum facti secundo anno prepositure Johannis de Scrogs

div.p:
Thomas yhule faber receptus fuit ex gracia consilij pro labore suo facto
circa ferrea communis operis burgi / et prestitit solitum Juramentum

Memorandum that Dauid hervy deforssit the sargiandis videlicet John' of spens' and sandy andirson'
the quhilk wald Adistressit for iij lib' forew thir witnes Alexander goldsmyth'
and Jamys of mar'
